item.title: Outgoing DNC Chair Claims Democrats Weren’t Woke Enough
item.description: Some party leaders just can’t quit identity politics.

item.title: How the Yale Women’s Center Was Colonized by Pro-Hamas Radicalism
item.description: While Jewish women may be welcomed elsewhere on campus, the Yale Women’s Center remains an anti-Israel advocacy organization.

item.title: The University of Michigan’s Shift on DEI Is Only a Start
item.description: It will take a lot more to fix the damage the woke agenda has inflicted on higher ed.

item.title: States Should Stop Subsidizing Union Politicking
item.description: In almost every state, government workers are doing labor unions’ political bidding on the taxpayer’s dime. This must end.

item.title: The Week: President Biden Pardons His Son
item.description: Plus: The spectacular failure of a South Korean self-coup.
